channel.title: The Ottomen Empire
channel.itunes:subtitle: Music Videos and puppets Podcast
channel.itunes:author: The Ottomen
channel.itunes:summary: The ambassadors of the Ottomen Empire hope you will enjoy these fine entertaining videos. Here you will find music videos by bands including but not limited to The Ottomen, Misung and teh Keyboards, and Paper Fleet. You will also find episodes of the George and Timmy show: Jim and Dave's never before aired puppet TV show!

item.title: Misung and the Keyboards, "Nose Ocean"
item.itunes:author: Misung Stevenson
item.itunes:summary: From the album, "Roger, Terror Machine." Misung from "The Ottomen" goes solo with "Nose Ocean". Includes some kazoo solos and footage from the north coast of california.
item.itunes:keywords: The Ottomen, Misung, David Stevenson, Nose Ocean

item.title: The Ottomen, "Lonely Surfer"
item.itunes:author: Misung Stevenson
item.itunes:keywords: Lonely Surfer, The Ottomen, Misung, David Stevenson, Mayo

item.title: The Ottomen, "Mayo"
item.itunes:author: Misung Stevenson
item.itunes:summary: Shot Live in 3-d (cross your eyes until the two images merge) at the Schafly Tap Room Dec 2009. Shot with the Fuji Finepix Real 3-D camera.
item.itunes:keywords: 3-D, Fuji Finepix Real 3-D, The Ottomen, Misung, David Stevenson, Mayo

item.title: The Ottomen, "Texting"
item.itunes:author: Misung Stevenson
item.itunes:summary: The Ottomen featuring Misung Stevenson, Walter Wroughton, Justin Dicenzo and Jim Campbell on drums. Disclaimer: The Ottomen do not endorse texting while driving, or videotaping yourself texting while driving.
item.itunes:keywords: The Ottomen, Misung, Jim Campbell, Walter Wroughton, Justin Dicenzo, David Stevenson, Paper Fleet, Texting, messaging
